actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 74 of title 38, United States Code, to revise certain provisions relating to the appointment of clinical and counseling psychologists in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Deletes provisions of Federal law requiring psychologists appointed for employment in the Veterans Health Administration to hold diplomas from accredited institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 74 of title 38, United States Code, to revise certain provisions relating to the appointment of clinical and counseling psychologists in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.
